startup.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: Oho! Whom do I spy, but a fool passer-by?
Do you chance upon us, like a cool butter-fly?
Or arrive with a porpoise, slick of fin and eye?

startup.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: Fool they are, looking in-this-site!
Where all are blind, from outset to out-sight.
Methinks we send them out, forthright!

startup.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: Fourth-right and all-for-one,
Exile's badly overdone,
Instead I say we spoil their fun!

startup.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: Well then, since games are fun and fun is won,
Let's play a game, and when it's done,
A prize we'll show, a spoiled bit of fun.

startup.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: We'll think of a card, and then we'll wait.
You name a card that we'll equate
in similarity from trait to trait.

startup.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: If yours and ours have traits the same,
A ‚úÖ will mark the correct claim.
Spot üî∂ for partway. Miss? ‚ùå, a shame.
And ‚¨ÜÔ∏è or ‚¨áÔ∏è to shift your aim.

startup.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: That's the script for this show.
We won't limit your guessing ammo,
So go to the get and get to the go!

hint.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: Did Merlin get to you, or are you just not smart?
Well, I can help you, from the goodness of my heart.
For at least one of __EDCOUNT__ edition(s), __ILLUST__ did the art.

hint.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: Since you're feeling vexed,
I'll share a piece of the card's text:
„Äå__TEXT__„Äç

hint.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: Coming to me is a sure bet!
In one of __EDCOUNT__ edition(s), __SET__ is the set,
and __RARITY__ is the rarity to get.

hint.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: I suppose I can do you a favor.
Maybe you can identify this card by its flavor:
„Äå__FLAVOR__„Äç

nohints.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: You're having a tough time, no doubt.
Unfortunately, for hints, we're plum out.

spoiler1.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: A victory earned, was that so hard?
As promised, we will spoil a card.
The first of three: the vanguard.

spoiler2.speaker: Tweedledee
lines: A second win? You're doing swell.
The deal is dealt, a card I'll tell.
From me myself to you: a poetic belle.

spoiler3.speaker: Tweedledum
lines: That's it! Your the third and final answer,
I'll share the truth about myself, a dancer,
but also a formiddable lancer.
